alert.note: Alert for Butte; Lawrence (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 9:23PM MDT until July 03 at 10:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Butte County in northwestern South Dakota... Western Lawrence County in west central South Dakota... Southeastern Crook County in northeastern Wyoming... * Until 1030 PM MDT. * At 923 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles northwest of Warren Peak to 3 miles northeast of Sundance to 6 miles northwest of Inyan Kara Mountain, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Moskee, Aladdin, Vore Buffalo Jump, Crow Peak, Cement Ridge Lookout, Beulah, Spearfish Canyon, Bridal Veil Falls, O`Neil Pass, western Spearfish, Roughlock Falls, Savoy and Iron Creek Lake. This includes... Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 1 and 8. Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 174 and 207. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure.
